rev.comment: CNET is perfectly fine as a source, but the text is way beyond what is in the article, This information really needs better sources...
rev.diff:
Line 159: Line 159:
===Legality===
===Legality===
â
The US Senate is set to meet on possible regulation regarding BitCoins and their legality under U.S. tax code. The Senate is set to rule on possibly prosecuting BitCoin miners under the RICO (Racketeer Influenced and Corrupt Organizations Act) laws. <ref>http://news.cnet.com/8301-13506_3-20070268-17/senators-target-bitcoin-currency-citing-drug-sales/</ref>
+
The US Senate is set to meet on possible regulation regarding BitCoins and their legality under U.S. tax code{{fact}}. The Senate is set to rule on possibly prosecuting BitCoin miners under the RICO (Racketeer Influenced and Corrupt Organizations Act) laws. <ref>http://news.cnet.com/8301-13506_3-20070268-17/senators-target-bitcoin-currency-citing-drug-sales/</ref>{{Failed verification|date=June 2011}}
